code: import Axios from"axios";export var GET_STATES_DATA="GET_STATES_DATA";export var stateInfoAction=function stateInfoAction(){return function(dispatch){Axios.get('https://api.covid19india.org/data.json').then(function(resp){dispatch({type:GET_STATES_DATA,payload:resp.data.statewise.slice(1,-1)});}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
